description:
The protagonist of the story.
A high school student enrolled in the "Buou Private Academy".
As the successor for the Yagyuu family that has been serving as sword instructor for the family of Tokugawa Shoguns for over 400 years, he is the assistant instructor of the "Yagyuu Training Hall" with more than 100 disciples.
Indecisive but gentle with anyone and sometimes carries the strength to fear nothing. Sixteen years old.
name: Yagyuu Muneakira
